item.title: Flytipping along Chadwick Rd, 23rd October
item.description:
Various items dumped al along the pavement from outside Draymans Mews down to the Print Village. A mattress, broken furniture and all sorts.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81, Chadwick Road, London

item.title: There is major flooding in the road and it is threatening to enter properties, 23rd October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): William Booth Road, Crystal Palace, London
